name: Moov
description: Moov is developing an open source platform enabling users to quickly deploy basic financial service tools. Moov is rebuilding banking infrastructure for a cloud-native world without any legacy technology dependencies. Moovâ€™s banking-as-a-service platform takes a developer-first approach of being open-source, portable to cloud providers or on-premises, modular for customization, and decoupled from any single bank program.
